'''All-Delicacy Parcels''' is a [[:Category:Special Dishes|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Crystal Shrimp]] with [[Xingqiu]]. The [[recipe]] for Crystal Shrimp is obtainable from [[Wanmin Restaurant]] for 2,500 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 20.

All-Delicacy Parcels restores '''26'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''570''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds.

==Trivia==
* The following birthday mails included All-Delicacy Parcels:
** [[Birthday/Xingqiu#Just the Two of Us!|Xingqiu's 2020 Birthday Mail]] (1 All-Delicacy Parcels)
** [[Birthday/Xingqiu#It's a nice time again.|Xingqiu's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (1 All-Delicacy Parcels)
* To celebrate Xingqiu's birthday in 2021, the [[Teyvat Food Notes]] posted a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/18067 real-life recipe] for All-Delicacy Parcels.
